Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
AI has been a great way to get extra tips/feedback on my assessments or study material. Though, its less reliable for factual details. The impact of it has been thats its much quicker and easier to get direct feedback. 

A teacher is more reliable and I can rely on them more for factual information, though timeliness is not as great as AI as uni teachers are not always available and it can take some time to hear back from them.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I suppose teacher feedback feels more personal, whereas AI not so much.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI gives me much more specific feedback, and more of it. Teachers are a little more vague and sometimes I can be left still feeling confused.
